body.p:
68
Feby 15th 5
Mrs Mary D Steadmond
Louisville Ky
Madam,

Your letter of this date addressed to His Excellency the Governor, in relation to your suffering condition, and your unsuccessful attempt to get aid from the military authorities at Louisville &c, has been refered to me for reply.

I have the honor to inclose herewith my certificate of your husbands enlistment and muster, which if you will present to the authorities, as evidence that your husband is in the service, I have no doubt you can get aid from them.
If you again fail let me know and I will see what further can be done for you.

Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Sevt
D W Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Genl of Ky
